column1: The Purple Pig////This might've been my favorite meal I had in Chicago
column2: and it was totally spur of the moment (my favorite)! I really can't recommend this place more
column3: even the service was top notch. During the time my friend was catching his breath outside from the richness of the marrow and pork shoulder
column4: a server came by and refolded his napkin perfectly. The little things definitely still matter!
